guide.introduction_rendered:
Sketchup Model

Additional Materials Required:

  • Hinges (12)
  • 1/2"x1" Bolts (12)
  • 1/2" Nuts (12)
  • 1/2" Washers (12)
Tools
  • Angle grinder
  • Welder
  • Wrenches or sockets
  • hole puncher
  • torch

lines.text: Punch holes in 4 of the hinge plates as shown with a 7/8" or 1" punch.
lines.text_raw: Punch holes in 4 of the hinge plates as shown with a 7/8" or 1" punch.

lines.text: Weld one plate with holes, one without holes, and 3 hinges together as shown, with the plates 1 1/8" apart and the hinge centered.
lines.text_raw: Weld one plate with holes, one without holes, and 3 hinges together as shown, with the plates 1 1/8" apart and the hinge centered.

lines.text: Make sure the side of the hinge that sticks out most is on the top; this way it won't interfere with the hopper metal below when installing the hopper.
lines.text_raw: Make sure the side of the hinge that sticks out most is on the top; this way it won't interfere with the hopper metal below when installing the hopper.

steps.title: Attaching the hinge plates to the hopper metal

lines.text: Torch the holes shown in the front piece.
lines.text_raw: Torch the holes shown in the front piece.

lines.text: Punch all of the holes shown in the side pieces and dirt deflector plate.
lines.text_raw: Punch all of the holes shown in the side pieces and dirt deflector plate.

lines.text: Place 1/2" bolts thru the side pieces and weld them.
lines.text_raw: Place 1/2" bolts thru the side pieces and weld them.

lines.text: Make sure you are making them mirror images of eachother.
lines.text_raw: Make sure you are making them mirror images of eachother.

lines.text: Bolt the hinge plate assemblies to the side pieces using a washer, lock washer, and nut on each bolt
lines.text_raw: Bolt the hinge plate assemblies to the side pieces using a washer, lock washer, and nut on each bolt
